info.name: New Dev's Dark StackOverflow
info.description: This theme is fork of Dev's Dark StackOverflow theme by Alex Saratow. He is an author of almost everything here and he is an original creator of a theme. But... as it was updated last time on 14th February 2017, I decided to fix most important things and - following the rights of the licence - publish it here, to make it easier to install, without having to make corrections on your own. Additionally, I followed Rafael Gawenda's tip to change every .so-header to .top-bar. Thank you! License stays same: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
